pkgmetadata.longdescription: ============Pseudopeople============Pseudopeople is a package intended to add configurable noise to a simulatedcensus-scale data-set written using standard scientific Python tools.**Pseudopeople requires Python 3.7-3.10 to run**You can install ``pseudopeople`` from PyPI with pip: ``> pip install pseudopeople``or build it from source with ``> git clone https://github.com/ihmeuw/pseudopeople.git`` ``> cd pseudopeople`` ``> python setup.py install``Documentation======================You can view documentation at https://pseudopeople.readthedocs.io/en/latest/
